name: codeRunner
description: Execute short code snippets in multiple languages (JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, Kotlin, MATLAB/Octave, R, C++, C#, Jupyter notebooks). Use this tool when the user asks to run or test code. Execution is sandboxed, limited to 5 seconds, no internet access, and outputs are truncated if too long.

code.description: The code snippet to execute. For 'notebook', provide full .ipynb JSON as a string.

filename.description: Optional filename hint (e.g., main.cpp, Program.cs). Not required for most languages.
